  2. Girl groups
  3. F.O.X

Yumi

Introduction

F.O.X, short for For Our X-Generation, was a four-member girl group under O.G Sound. They debuted on December 10, 1999 with their debut studio album, Rul-Ing. They officially disbanded in May 2000.
